title: Continuation of the National Emergency With Respect to Certain Terrorist Attacks
summary: The document is a notice from the President, published in the Federal Register on September 3, 2025, announcing the continuation of the national emergency declared on September 14, 2001, in response to the terrorist attacks of September 11, 2001. The President extends the emergency for an additional year due to the ongoing and immediate threat of further terrorist attacks on the United States. The notice is to be published in the Federal Register and transmitted to Congress.
